poem:
Title: "In an Era of Dollars and Decibels"

Plump air, charged with verity,
betrays the braille of power's vanity,
Silence, bruised and painted gold,
teeters on ledger's cold hold.
Seven men and five,
In judgment's lofty hive,
Ponder an adult star's storm, 
a transaction forged and warm.
The garden seasons this brute refrain,
Yet, it's the plums who absorb the stain.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Trump’s hush-money trial: what happened on 22 April at a glance Donald Trump is the first former US president to face criminal charges. The 2024 Republican presumptive presidential nominee faces the threat of prison if he is convicted. A jury of seven men and five women will weigh the New York case’s allegation that Trump falsified the financial transaction behind the $130,000 hush-money payment to the adult film star Stormy Daniels. Trump was charged with". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
